name: DTOC
purpose: This function will convert a D type field into an A type field.

parts.description: The D type field to be converted. The original field value is not changed.
The size of the A type version of the date to return. The default is 8 (mm/dd/yy). You can use any legal date size as the value.

return_type: A If the receiving field is not long enough the returned value will be truncated.
